context: Streaming devices emerged as cord-cutting enablers. Roku XDS supported 1080p for $99. Apple TV 2nd gen launched at $99 but only 720p. Boxee and Google TV entered market at higher price points.

competitors.name: Apple TV
competitors.notes: 2nd gen Sept 2010, $99, only 720p, sold 1M units by Dec 2010

competitors.name: Boxee Box
competitors.notes: Hardware device from Boxee, excellent local media playback

competitors.name: Google TV
competitors.notes: Launched 2010, close to $300, different market positioning

competitors.name: Western Digital TV Live Plus
competitors.notes: $99, two USB ports, Netflix and YouTube support
